title: Can the species be transported to Cinderella Castle in the event of a hurricane?
subtitle: An ancient urban legend but still flourishing about Walt Disney's world in Florida says that the longest building in the garden, Cinderella Castle, was built so that it could be completely or partially dismantled in the event of a hurricane.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Cinderella Castle in Walt Disney World, Orlando, Florida, was built so that it could be partially or totally dismantled in the event of a hurricane.
